test/demoSystem/cfg/sm_streams.py

00001 import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms
00002 
00003 process = cms.Process("SM")
00004 
00005 process.source = cms.Source("FragmentInput")
00006 
00007 process.out1 = cms.OutputModule("EventStreamFileWriter",
00008                                 streamLabel = cms.string('A'),
00009                                 maxSize = cms.int32(20),
00010                                 SelectHLTOutput = cms.untracked.string('out4DQM')
00011                                 )
00012 
00013 process.out2 = cms.OutputModule("EventStreamFileWriter",
00014                                 streamLabel = cms.string('B'),
00015                                 maxSize = cms.int32(40),
00016                                 SelectEvents = cms.untracked.PSet( SelectEvents = cms.vstring('DiMuon', 'CalibPath', 'DiElectron', 'HighPT') ),
00017                                 SelectHLTOutput = cms.untracked.string('PhysicsOModule')
00018                                 )
00019 
00020 process.out3 = cms.OutputModule("EventStreamFileWriter",
00021                                 streamLabel = cms.string('C'),
00022                                 maxSize = cms.int32(60),
00023                                 SelectEvents = cms.untracked.PSet( SelectEvents = cms.vstring('DiMuon', 'HighPT') ),
00024                                 SelectHLTOutput = cms.untracked.string('PhysicsOModule')
00025                                 )
00026 
00027 process.out4 = cms.OutputModule("ErrorStreamFileWriter",
00028                                 streamLabel = cms.string('Error'),
00029                                 maxSize = cms.int32(1)
00030                                 )
00031 
00032 #process.end1 = cms.EndPath(process.out1)
00033 process.end2 = cms.EndPath(process.out2)
00034 #process.end3 = cms.EndPath(process.out3)
00035 process.end4 = cms.EndPath(process.out4)
